featured.text: A second kind of medicine is called “natural cures,” or “folk medicine,” in which less educated people try to cure sicknesses with various herbs.
Scientific doctors try to observe sicknesses, look for logical patterns, and then find out how the human body works.
Motion sickness occurs when the signals your brain receives from your eyes, ears, and body 17 .
Moreover, the effect is often 20 space motion sickness, headaches, and nausea.

definition.en_def: A condition of being ill or unwell.
definition.example: She took a day off work due to sickness.
